Story: When making a search, should be able to navigate between results.
After successful login, and arriving on the My account page, log out and assert that the title is correct.
Successful affiliate registration with check payee name only.
After a login attempt with invalid credentials, assert that the error message is correct.
After adding an address, the success message should be correct.
After changing user account information, the success message should be correct.
After a login attempt with valid credentials, assert that the title is the My Account Page title.
After a registration attempt with invalid credentials, assert that the error message is correct.
After deleting the address, the success message should be correct.
When listing all products from a product category, the products should appear.
When listing all products from a brand, and sorting for descending price order, the first price should be the highest.
After a registration attempt with valid credentials assert that the title is correct.
After opening the privacy policy modal, the modal title is correct.
